body_html:
@vrv ready for review! Couple of judgement calls:

  • Included GIF support. decode_gif returns a 4-D tensor as opposed to 3-D for decode_jpeg and decode_png due to the extra "number-of-frames" dimension. I'm also not sure if decode_gif is supposed to be exposed publicly yet (currently not in the API).
  • Did not add actual image files to be read from disk and tested- stuck with hard-coded byte strings.
